html:
Library Book Issue Receipt

Member Name: {{ frappe.db.get_value("Library Member", member, "member_name") }}

Email: {{ frappe.db.get_value("Library Member", member, "email") }}

Book Name: {{ frappe.db.get_value("Library Book", book, "book_name") }}

Author: {{ frappe.db.get_value("Library Book", book, "author") }}

Issue Date: {{ frappe.format(frappe.db.get_value("Library Transaction", name, "issue_date") )}}

Return Date: {{ frappe.format(frappe.db.get_value("Library Transaction", name, "return_date" ))}}

{% if frappe.db.get_value("Library Transaction", name, "status") == "Overdue" %}

Your book is overdue

{% elif frappe.db.get_value("Library Transaction", name, "status") == "Returned" %}

Your book is Returned

{% else %}

Your book is Issued

{% endif %}
name: Library_print_formate
